title: What's Wrong With Secretary Kim?
alternative_title: Kimbiseoga Wae Geureolgga ; Why Secretary Kim ; Why would Secretary Kim do that ; 김 비서가 왜 그럴까 ; 김비서가 왜 그럴까
status: Kimbiseoga Wae Geureolgga ; Why Secretary Kim ; Why would Secretary Kim do that ; 김 비서가 왜 그럴까 ; 김비서가 왜 그럴까
description:
Description :
        Handsome, loaded, and arrogant Youngjoon is the VP of a major corporation. Miso has been his perfect secretary, practically legend for surviving her narcissistic boss for 9 long years. But now that she?s quitting, is there really nothing -- or no one -- that can stop her from walking away? Based on the original hit novels by Jeong Gyeong Yun, and now adapted into a Korean TV drama (airing June 2018).
